Articles.Content:
Just now, rbray89 said:

News to me... are you certain?

Well it is the only planet that it isn't working on. Updated it to the new layout and no luck. Everything else is working fine though.

3 minutes ago, Nhawks17 said:

Well it is the only planet that it isn't working on. Updated it to the new layout and no luck. Everything else is working fine though.

Logs would be the next required item. What does the GUI say? Any invalid fields?

Gotcha, here yah go. And I don't have anything red in the GUI, the only thing that says Invalid is Invalid Name but I get that for everything.

output_log.txt

KSP.log

clouds.cfg (in case you want to look at it)

Just updated the links, don't know why they copied like that...

Edited December 21, 2015 by Nhawks17
rbray I see some new commits about a new dynamic texture loader, would this mean textures are only loaded in screen space or similar? If so that's incredibly awesome

2 hours ago, pingopete said:

rbray I see some new commits about a new dynamic texture loader, would this mean textures are only loaded in screen space or similar? If so that's incredibly awesome

WIP

ok did some decent testing for the current buiild  for u.

1. Current build gave black sky if had scatter installed.

2. the see thru windows didnt want to work for me i keep getting  invisible outer texture of the whole capsule for lander cans and the pods didnt have anything( when this happned i noted rpm thowing a error. didn ttest without rpm thou)

3. when u drop a part back into side to get rid of it in ediot u get a 1-2sec freeze as it unloads.

ok next i tested on 3 different ksp buiilds  stock,heavy modded, and 64 bit hack(i know not supported i just tested since i have a working install)

ram usage (dx-11)  all 3 wher roughly the same at aroundd 40-60% ram reduction.

load times

load times became 4 times longer but on stock(didnt have ATM installed on it)

Conclusion

Very good work justs neds more tweaking and such. It needs a exclude funtion as i think the issue with rpm might be it cant load the textures  right. There is a shader conlfict with  scatter but sure u 2 work that out.

Way i see it even current form it will give people extended play time on heavy modded builds but down side is when u put ship together u risk sudden ctd in areas u didnt before due to sudden rise in the texture being loaded. My average load times on both my normal and 64bit hack  heavy modded where arouond 20min from hitting ksp.exe to start screen.

 

 

Edited December 25, 2015 by sidfu

Awesome! Thanks for the feedback. Been working on an update... The transparent windows don't show yet as I have yet to include the textures.
well on the windows it made the whole of the lander cans and such invisible and u could see everything inside.

6 minutes ago, sidfu said:

well on the windows it made the whole of the lander cans and such invisible and u could see everything inside.

 

 

That's because I haven't included the new textures yet.
ah didnt phrase that right. what i meant i know the textures missing but only the lander cans are see thru. normal pods dont do it.
hello, how is it to make windows transparent  ?

Is Laythe supposed to have cities? I can't find a way to turn them off.

This is in KSP 1.1.2, with E.V.E. that I downloaded on April 28.
